title: **All Ball Championship Game Special** Gonzaga Asst. Roger Powell Talks UCLA Thriller, Suggs Buzzer Beater, Baylor -- Hartford HC John Gallagher with Title Game X's O's
itunes:title: **All Ball Championship Game Special** Gonzaga Asst. Roger Powell Talks UCLA Thriller, Suggs Buzzer Beater, Baylor -- Hartford HC John Gallagher with Title Game X's O's
description:
In this episode, Doug is joined by Gonzaga Assistant Coach Roger Powell who looks back at their semifinal war with UCLA, Jalen Suggs thrilling buzzer beater, why the Bruins were so tough and looks ahead to the matchup against surging Baylor, and his own experience playing in a national championship game with Illinois in 2005.

Hartford Head Coach John Gallagher and Doug dive deep into the X's and O's of the Gonzaga/UCLA semifinal classic, and why the Bruins had more success against the Zags than anyone else this season, They also look ahead to Monday night's championship game, the key matchups, and what Baylor and Gonzaga each need to do to take home the hardware. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
